{"id":1503449747,"question_id":3394,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4Â weeks","timestamp":1736460196,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1503449747/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Array End","memory":"8.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long minEnd(int n, int x) { //1 <= n, x <= 10^8\n        //nums[i] < nums[i+1]\n        // x == nums[0] & nums[1] & ... & nums[n-1]\n        n--; //Reducing n by 1 to exclude x from the iteration\n        long long result = x;\n        long long mask;\n        // Step 1: Iterate over each bit position with mask starting at 1 and\n        // shifting left\n        for(mask=1; n>0; mask <<=1) {\n            // Step 2: If the corresponding bit in x is 0\n            if( ( mask & x ) == 0 ) {\n                // Set the bit in result based on the least significant bit of n\n                result |= ( n & 1 ) * mask;\n                n>>=1;// Shift n to the right by 1 to process the next bit\n            }\n        }\n        return result;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-array-end","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
